verses.verse: And in that day <WH3117> thou shalt say <WH559>, I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah; for though thou wast angry <WH599> with me <WH639>, thine anger is turned away <WH7725> and thou comfortest me <WH5162>.

Behold <WH410>, God is my salvation <WH3444>; I will trust <WH982>, and will not be afraid <WH6342>; for Jehovah <WH3050>, even Jehovah <WH3068>, is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>; and he is become my salvation <WH3444>.
Therefore with joy <WH8342> shall ye draw <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the wells <WH4599> of salvation <WH3444>.

And in that day <WH3117> shall ye say <WH559>, Give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>, declare <WH3045> his doings <WH5949> among the peoples <WH5971>, make mention <WH2142> that his name <WH8034> is exalted <WH7682>.
Sing <WH2167> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; for he hath done <WH6213> excellent things <WH1348>: let this be known <WH3045> in all the earth <WH776>.
Cry aloud <WH6670> and shout <WH7442>, thou inhabitant <WH3427> of Zion <WH6726>; for great <WH1419> in the midst <WH7130> of thee is the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>.
